overview: Sherlock Holmes, a clever and renowned London detective, uses his cunning and superior powers of deduction to investigate crimes that the local police department can't unravel on their own. With help from Sherlock's brilliant and sexy assistant Jane Watson, the duo solve crimes in and around London... using their sexual prowess to uncover the truth as they probe even deeper to hunt down criminals together.
title: Sherlock: A XXX Parody
